text: Romblon is an island province in the Philippines. It is in the Mimaropa region. The capital is Romblon. According to the 2020 census, 308,985 people lived there. The province is south of Marinduque and Quezon, east of Oriental Mindoro, north of Aklan and Capiz, and west of Masbate. The province has three main islands: Tablas, Sibuyan and Romblon. The other crops grown here are fruits, rice and vegetables. Category:Island provinces of the Philippines Category:Mimaropa
title: Romblon
